Everything you need to know about investing in student startups

Getting Started

1. Create Your Account

Register as an investor by providing your university credentials. Verification ensures a trusted community.

Register Now

2. Browse Startups

Explore verified student startups from partner universities. Filter by category, stage, or university.

Browse Startups

3. Start Investing

Invest as little as PKR 100. Diversify across multiple startups or focus on your favorites.

Investment Tiers

Supporter
PKR 100 - 999
  • Early supporter recognition
  • Progress updates
  • Community access
Advocate
PKR 1,000 - 4,999
  • All Supporter benefits
  • Exclusive updates
  • Beta access to products
  • Founder shoutouts
Champion
PKR 5,000 - 9,999
  • All Advocate benefits
  • Premium merchandise
  • Direct founder communication
  • Priority support
Angel
PKR 10,000+
  • All Champion benefits
  • Revenue-share options
  • Advisory opportunities
  • VIP recognition

What Investors Receive

üéÅ

Rewards & Perks

Startups offer exclusive rewards like merchandise, early access, and special recognition.

üìä

Progress Updates

Regular updates on milestones, growth metrics, and how your investment is being used.

üèÜ

Recognition

Early supporter badges, leaderboard rankings, and acknowledgment in startup communications.

üí∞

Future Returns

Revenue-share options in later rounds as startups mature and scale.

Risk & Safety

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes

  • No Equity at Launch: Initial investments are reward-based, not equity-based due to regulatory considerations.
  • Start Small: Invest only what you can afford to lose. Startups are high-risk ventures.
  • Diversify: Spread investments across multiple startups to reduce risk.
  • Do Your Research: Review startup profiles, business models, and team backgrounds before investing.

Platform Fees

Campus Invest charges a platform commission of 5-10% per funding round, paid by the startup. Investors pay no fees.

Startup onboarding fees range from PKR 2,000-5,000 depending on the startup type.

Ready to Start?

Join hundreds of investors supporting Pakistan's next generation of innovators.

Register as Investor Browse Startups

Campus Invest

Pakistan's first university-centered micro-investment platform. Empowering student entrepreneurs, one investment at a time.
